buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-sm font-medium transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 rounded-sm font-medium
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-6 rounded-sm

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-sm border border-border shadow-sm p-6

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-sm border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

dashboard.sidebar: w-64 hidden md:flex flex-col border-r border-border bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-xl h-screen sticky top-0

instructions_to_main_agent: IMPLEMENT THE DARK THEME BY DEFAULT. Override the CSS variables in index.css with the palette provided.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all H1, H2, H3 headings to give it a premium editorial look.
Use 'Manrope' for all body text and UI elements.
Ensure all cards have sharp or very subtle rounded corners (rounded-sm) to mimic photo prints.
The Dashboard should feel like a 'Cockpit' or 'Darkroom' - high contrast, dark background, white text.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
For the 'Content Calendar', use a custom grid layout that looks like a film strip.
For 'Analytics', use simple, high-contrast line charts (white lines on dark bg) using Recharts or Shadcn Charts.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid dark colors with subtle borders.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts.
Use generous padding (p-8, p-12) to create breathing room.
Micro-interactions are mandatory for all buttons and cards.
Never use pure black (#000000) - use #09090b or #18181b.
Ensure text contrast meets WCAG AA standards.
